about_the_game:
Game Introduction

Demon Suppression Realm is a card based Roguelite game developed and published by Drunken Dog. The main gameplay is card battles based on building decks. This game combines traditional card building with Roguelite gameplay. Players need to build unique decks in the game, embark on adventures in this fantastical dark continent, and challenge unknown monsters. In the game, there are hundreds of different battle cards and dozens of artifacts that can help players embark on adventures. In the game, besides encountering battles of different intensities, you will also trigger various exciting encounter events. In the face of different events, there will be randomly generated choices, and every choice made by the player has an impact on their adventure.

    In this fantastical dark continent, you can choose one of four distinct characters to embark on an adventure!
  • Utilize the unique characteristics and mechanisms of each character to defeat the monsters you encounter!



    In addition to striving to defeat monsters, you can also encounter different people or events in different regions of the continent!

  • You can explore natural caves full of unknowns

  • You can also take a break at the punk hotel

  • You can also purchase the supplies you need in the store

Innovative Design

Compared to the traditional card pigeon game 'Demon Suppression Realm', the following minor innovations have been made

  • The game's progression form uses semi open map exploration, replacing the traditional single route selection

  • In the game's building system, in addition to regular card building, additional building systems have been added
    • Character Skill System
    • Character card restraint adaptation system
    • Character Basic Attribute System


    In this game, you can have a new experience that traditional pigeon cards do not have!

    Come and adventure in this fantastic continent! My hero!

name: Demon Suppression Realm

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7400 or AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960 or AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-9400 or AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1660 or AMD Radeon RX5600
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Demon Suppression Realm is a card based Roguelite game developed and published by Drunken Dog. The main gameplay is card battles based on building decks.
